place.name: STONDON MASSEY
place.gazetteerText: STONDON-MASSEY, a parish in Ongar district, Essex; 2 miles SE of Ongar r. station. Post town, Brentwood. Acres, 1,120. Real property, £790. Pop., 273. Houses, 54. S. Place is the seat of P. H. Meyer, Esq. The living is a rectory in the diocese of Rochester. Value, £416.* Patron, E. Reeve, Esq. The church is good. Charities, £17. (In 1870-72, John Marius Wilson's Imperial Gazetteer of England and Wales)
